TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSDualHttpBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement

summary.span: 表示安全且互通之繫結的組態項目，且這個繫結適用於雙工服務合約或透過 SOAP 媒介的通訊。

span.span: Represents the configuration element for a secure and interoperable binding that is suitable for duplex service contracts or communication through SOAP intermediaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks wsDualHttpBinding 是安全、可靠且互通的繫結，適用於雙工服務合約。The wsDualHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for duplex service contracts. 根據預設，它在產生執行階段堆疊時會搭配 WS-ReliableMessaging (可靠性)、WS-Security (安全性和驗證)、HTTP (訊息傳遞) 以及 Text/XML (訊息編碼)。By default, it generates a run-time stack with WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability, WS-Security for message security and authentication, HTTP for message delivery, and a Text/XML message encoding. 此繫結需要用戶端具備公用 URI。This binding requires that the client has a public URI. 透過一個或多個 SOAP 媒介，它就可以用來進行可靠的通訊。It can be used to communicate reliably through one or more SOAP intermediaries.

span.span: wsDualHttpBinding Element

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.

span.span: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 如果近端網址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the proxy server is bypassed for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ ClientBaseAddress { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.ClientBaseAddress : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI，這個 URI 會指定用戶端在上面接聽以接收來自服務之回應訊息的基底位址 (Base Address)。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that specifies the base address the client listens to for response messages from the service.

value.span: URI，指定用戶端在上面接聽以接收來自服務之回應訊息的基底位址。

span.span: A URI that specifies the base address that the client listens to for response messages from the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性具有值，便會使用這個位址 (再加上每個通道的 GUID) 來接聽。If this property has a value, this address (plus a GUID for each channel) is used for listening. 否則，便會以傳輸特定的方式來產生用戶端基底位址。Otherwise, the client base address is generated in a transport-specific manner.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於剖析 URI 的 HTTP 主機名稱比較模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP hostname comparison mode used to parse URIs.

value.span: 有效的 值，指定在比較 URI 時是否會使用主機名稱來存取服務。

span.span: A valid value that specifies whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示比對時忽略主機名稱。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname in the match.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void InitializeFrom(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding) cil managed

span.span: A collection of binding elements.

summary.span: 使用指定之繫結集合的內容，初始化此繫結組態區段。

span.span: Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可配置給訊息緩衝區管理員的最大記憶體量 (以位元組為單位)，這個訊息緩衝區管理員會接收以此繫結所設定端點上的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that can be allocated for the message buffer manager, which receives messages at the endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 使用此繫結設定之端點所使用緩衝區集區的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 預設值為 524288 的位元組。

span.span: The default value is 524288 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxReceivedMessageSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可在使用此繫結所設定之通道上接收的訊息大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.

value.span: 由此繫結處理之訊息的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓服務使用 類別從網路傳輸所接收訊息的大小，會受限於配置給各訊息的記憶體量。The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the class is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 這項關於訊息大小的限制是為了防止受到 DoS 攻擊。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to DoS-style attacks. 請注意， 和 的設定是本機行為設定。Note that the settings for and , are local behavioral settings. 表示這些設定不會以中繼資料的方式傳送到其他端點。This means that they are not transmitted to other endpoints in metadata. 當您從中繼資料產生服務的 Proxy 時，如果訊息大小上限為 2GB，則此 Proxy 的預設值仍為 64K，If you generate a proxy to a service with a maximum message size of 2GB from metadata, the proxy still has a default value 64K. 讓訊息和訊息緩衝區大小適當限制的控制落在本機系統管理員的管轄範圍內。This leaves control of the appropriate bounds for message and message buffer size in the scope of local administrators.

span.span: A value that specifies the encoder used to encode the message.

value.span: 預設值為 。

member this.ProxyAddress : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定指定 HTTP Proxy 位址的 URI。

span.span: Gets or set a URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.

value.span: 指定 HTTP Proxy 位址的 URI。

span.span: A URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性設為 `true`，這個參數的值將被略過。If the property is set to `true`, the value of this property is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReaderQuotas As XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定複雜性條件約束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜度條件約束的包含項目，包括最大項目深度，或是訊息內的最大字串內容長度。The complexity constraints include items such as a maximum element depth, or a maximum length for string content within the message. 條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類型。The constraints protect against a type of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReliableSession As StandardBindingReliableSessionElement

summary.span: 取得組態項目，這個組態項目會指定是否已為使用此繫結設定的端點啟用可靠的工作階段。

span.span: Gets a configuration element that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: ，指定是否已為使用此繫結設定的端點啟用可靠的工作階段。

span.span: An that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 wsDualHttpBinding 繫結設定的服務需要可靠的工作階段。A reliable session is required for services configured with wsDualHttpBinding binding.

span.span: The that specifies the security settings used with this binding.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值會指定繫結程序是否支援流動 WS-Transactions。

span.span: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions.

value.span: 如果繫結支援流動的 WS-Transactions，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值指定用戶端不會流動異動，且服務拒絕具有流動異動訊息標頭的訊息。The default value specifies that clients do not flow transactions and services reject messages with a flowed transaction message header.
